work.name: Ubilife
work.summary:
worked on two development projects during my time at Ubilife. 

Running Othello2: Two player android game that used NFC tags to simulate Othello board. Game also had additional sensor based physical tasks and educational material related to physical education

Minerva: A programming education game that also adapts to the play and Learning style of the player. Client-side developed on Unity3D and back-end using Spring boot & MySQL
